resources.string: Use the widget on your home screen to look at the albums artwork and to have easy access to its wikipedia page, a link to your preferred streaming platform and for a convenient way to get reminded to rate the last album.

This app is an appendix to the wonderful website https://1001albumsgenerator.com/

The app is a hobby project, where I wanted to show the daily albums cover art on the home screen, because I like cover art.

The actual app is not as feature complete as the website, so use it as you will, but I recommend using the widget.
To start your journey, you need a user.\n\nYou should create a user on the website and enter the username here.
